supplementary-material.label: TABLE S3
supplementary-material.p: Ferret humane endpoint scoring chart used for daily assessment of ferrets based on multiple behavioral and clinical criteria. DPI, days postinfection; E/D, eating/drinking. Download Table S3, PDF file, 0.03 MB.
